articles.title: Welcome to Your New ROG Xbox Ally: Essential Tips for Getting Started - Xbox Wire
articles.description: Picking up a new ROG Xbox Ally or ROG Xbox Ally X? To help you hit the ground running, we’ve pulled together some must-know tips to make the most out of your new handheld.

articles.title: Breaking: Exynos 2600 goes official as world's first 2nm smartphone chip - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung has announced the Exynos 2600 chip. It is not only the company's but the world's first 2nm mobile chip, made using Samsung Foundry's 2nm GAA process. With its innovative heat transfer technology, Samsung is promising much better sustained performance …

articles.title: Oh snap, I have a new favorite phone grip - The Verge
articles.description: In the war of double-sided magnetic phone grips, Syncwire and OhSnap Snap Grip 5 are the best I’ve tried.

articles.title: Waterfox browser goes AI-free, targets the Firefox faithful - theregister.com
articles.description: : Even if Mozilla is going to add an AI kill switch, that may not be enough to reassure many.
